title: How to Do the Perfect Step Overs in Soccer

steps.title: Make sure your soccer ball is well inflated.
steps.content: Make sure your soccer ball is well inflated.

steps.title: Dribble at a nice, slow pace for beginning.
steps.content: Dribble at a nice, slow pace for beginning.

steps.title: Make sure you are about 1 meter (3.3 ft) from the your opponent, or chances are he/she will get the ball from you.
steps.content: Make sure you are about 1 meter (3.3 ft) from the your opponent, or chances are he/she will get the ball from you.

steps.title: Place your weaker foot on the side of the ball that you wish to start your step over from, as if you are going to step on your left foot with your right.
steps.content: Place your weaker foot on the side of the ball that you wish to start your step over from, as if you are going to step on your left foot with your right.

steps.title: Bring your stronger foot over and around the ball and stop it on the opposite side of the ball.
steps.content: Bring your stronger foot over and around the ball and stop it on the opposite side of the ball. Repeat the process with the opposite foot.
